content:
Thunderbird is a FREE, opensource program. No donation is required to download, install, or use it, though it is appreciated by the developers.

Be sure you are downloading it from the official source, not some scam cite.

https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/all/
creator: rednoise

content: Not easily, as far as I know. If you open a message in a new window, turn off all toolbars, and maximize that window, you'll come kinda close, but you will still see the header bar. I don't know what your motivation is, but for me, with all the steps you have to go through, it wouldn't be worth the bother.
creator: rednoise
